segments.text: I'm struck by the serene view outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A neat garden path and some lovely bushes are visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the unfolding chaos inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her task, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so calm, her expression so neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water splashing around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be so cold and unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's utterly absorbed in that one small, mundane chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her kitchen is slowly being flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And her children are risking a fall right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is almost unbelievable to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for her eventual realization.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility of the outside world seems to mock the interior scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really makes you wonder about what people miss in their daily routines.
segments.speaker: PAR
